name: DODGECUBE 2 DX
description:
DODGECUBE 2 is a game about, you guessed it, DODGING cubes! Enjoy over ten characters with the free version, and over fifteen in the Deluxe Edition! Input special codes for custom, unlisted characters, get ULTRA HARDCORE mode and go crazy! Go into competitive mode and get the local highscore!

For those of you looking to simply try the game, go here for the free version of the game!
